title: Brown Lenox -- Rube Marquard Throwing, PSA 2(MK)
author: Rhotchkiss

posts.post_title: Brown Lenox -- Rube Marquard Throwing, PSA 2(MK)
posts.post_content:
T206 Brown Lenox Rube Marquard, PSA2(mk):  $20,000.

Its an amazing looking example.  The (mk) is because of the "308" written on the bottom of the back.   Only 1 of 2 on the pop reports.  

Excluding the Ty Cobb and Brown Old Mill, Brown Lenox is the rarest of all T206 backs.  Hall of Fame examples of Brown Lenox are super rare.  At one point I was working on a Brown Lenox subset, but I have decided to give up the ghost.   I will list these here for 2-3 days. If they don't sell, I will likely take down the listing and keep or consign.

Will accept wire, check, or PayPal FF.  I will cover shipping. 

PM me with questions

I hope people realize just how incredibly rare and special Brown Lenox's are. 

Great cards for sale, Ryan.
